course.subject: ISDN
course.name: Advanced Sketching
course.description: The course enhances the visual communication and creativity skills of students through a palette of advanced sketching skills such as how to draw in perspective and; how to develop visual narratives vis-Ã -vis scripts and storyboards. A larger spectrum of tools and materials will be introduced such as drawing with markers and other mixed-media. The course contains extensive in-studio sketching sessions where students will explore various advanced sketching approaches under the guidance of the instructor; to further develop their individual creativity and visual communication skills. The course requires basic knowledge on sketching.
